feed.title: ToolJet Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.42.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

üöÄ Features

  • Adding a section for commonly used data sources by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9468
  • Marking workspace constants in front-end - Security improvements by @AnantshreeChandola in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9596

üõ†Ô∏è Fixes

  • Add borders to data source manager page and workspace constant sidebar by @kriks7iitk in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9690
  • Fix cropping of datasource icon in data source card by @AnantshreeChandola in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9681
  • Added proper messages when empty-folder UI is loaded by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9571
  • Fix for new data-source name accepts "<,>" but shows html entities "<" and ">" accordingly by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9602
  • Fix for In app builder navigation right click not working by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9576
  • Tooljet db schema not exporting when exporting app by @AnantshreeChandola in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9708
  • Improve UI style for data source headers by @AnantshreeChandola in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9667
  • Deprecating workspace variables info message by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9616
  • Deprecating local data sources- info message by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9704 and https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9704
  • Fix for duplicate query on version creation by @kriks7iitk in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9588

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.41.1...v2.42.0

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.43.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

üöÄ Features

  • Primary key support in ToolJet Database in #9279 by: @S-Abdul-Rahman & @ganesh8056
  • Foreign key support in ToolJet Database in #9544 by @S-Abdul-Rahman, @ganesh8056 & @manishkushare
  • Unique constraint support in ToolJet Database in #9279 by @S-Abdul-Rahman & @ganesh8056
  • Serial datatype support in ToolJet Database in #9279 by @S-Abdul-Rahman & @ganesh8056
  • Salesforce plugin integration in #9583 by @parthy007 & @ShazanRizvi

‚≠ê Improvements

  • Standardised error handling setup for ToolJet Database in #9629 by @akshaysasidrn
  • Preselected default values in ToolJet Database create new row in #9341 by @parthy007

üõ†Ô∏è Fixes

  • Cell select focus border issue in ToolJet database in #9409 by @S-Abdul-Rahman
  • Capitalization issue in ToolJet database dashboard drawer column names in #9341 by @parthy007

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.42.0...v2.43.0
